source_sentence: 仰依聖典了義文　　粗述戒藏開要門　普為法界燃一燈　　願用傳燈周十方　四句三聚戒圓滿　　六意五修為成辨　遠離二邊滅諸罪　　等飡一味遊方外持犯要記一卷寬元二甲辰十一月二十四日摸功畢。
translation: Relying on the holy scriptures to understand the meaning of the text, he roughly describes the precepts collection and opens the essentials, universally burns a single lamp for the Dharma realm, and wishes to use it to spread the lamp around the ten directions, completely completes the four sentences and three groups of precepts, and establishes the six intentions and five cultivations for discernment, secludes himself from the two extremes, ceases sins, and carries out the essentials of observing and violating the precepts beyond the four directions in one volume.
Encouragement to the Saṃgha of Duan Temple to Endure with Faith
Banruo Temple Dharma Wheel Turning Treasury

source_sentence: 寬永十六之天南京遊學之時以東大寺上生院古本書寫旃冀令律灯傳諸無窮矣。
translation: When he traveled to Nanjing on the 16th day of his training, Kōyō wrote down the ancient text of the Shōsōin temple in hopes of transmitting the Lamp of the Vinaya to infinity.
I am grateful to the junior monk at Quanchong for his attention.
